summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Phase 6 implementation - AI Test Spot and Temporary Payment Panel. All backend APIs and frontend features working correctly with proper public/protected access controls.

Get ID/PW and Recharge buttons redirect to login
Admin login works with admin@test.com / admin123
Admin Payment Panel shows test mode warning
Payment Panel - Simulate Payment creates pending order
Payment Panel - Mark as Received updates wallet balance
AI Test Spot shows test mode warning
AI Test Spot - Send test message gets mock response
Admin dashboard shows Payment Panel and AI Test Spot nav items
All backend API endpoints (11/11 tests passed)
Public site info and games API working
AI test simulation and logging functional
